modName: Chillrend Sound Bug Fix and Removal
summary: Removes the idle sound for Chillrend that can persist even if you sheathe or unequip it.
descriptionHtml:
Removes the idle sound for Chillrend that can persist even if you sheathe or unequip it. It will also however remove the idle sound for the spell \"frostbite\" (the crackling sound when its drawn). If this is ever remedied in an upcoming update, simply remove the soundfile from your mag/frostbite folder that I include here.

Installtion:
Just drop the folder into your skyrim installation destination.

Thanks to 1GurU9, I am using his silent audio file that he also uses in his elemental shout fix.
author: Voular

files.name: Chillrend Sound Bug Fix and Removal
